channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The U.S. Should Resume Nuclear Weapons Testing
item.description: Men are not angels, and therefore the United States must always maintain an arsenal designed to deter aggression from nations that wish us ill.

item.title: The Virtue of Liberty: A Response to the NatCons
item.description: To abandon limited government is to corrupt conservatism.

item.title: Here, the Law Is King
item.description: We promise to give you analysis that starts with what the law is — not ‘No Kings’ hysteria.

item.title: The Clinging Evil of Antisemitism
item.description: We shouldn’t tolerate hatred of Jews disguised as foreign-policy talk.

item.title: New Mexico’s ‘Free’ Child Care an Attempt to Cover for Past Failures
item.description: New Mexico’s track record of competently delivering services to help its children is poor to say the least.

item.title: Trump's testing plans for U.S. nuclear weapons won't include explosions, energy secretary says
item.description: New tests of the U.S. nuclear weapons system ordered up by President Donald Trump will not include nuclear explosions, Energy Secretary Chris Wright s...

item.title: Spanbeger holds a double-digit edge over Earle-Sears in the Virginia gubernatorial race: poll
item.description: Democrat Abigail Spanberger has the upper hand against Republican Lt. Gov. Winsome Earle-Sears in polling for Virginia's gubernatorial race.

item.title: Newsom: Tuesday's elections will mark turning point in Trump presidency

item.title: Shutdown stalemate set to drag into sixth week as Trump pushes Republicans to change Senate rules
item.description: Republicans and Democrats remained at a stalemate on the government shutdown over the weekend as it headed into its sixth week, with food aid potentia...

item.title: SNAP benefits in jeopardy as government shutdown drags into fifth week

item.title: The U.S. Conference Of Catholic Bishops Needs To Stop Apologizing For Islam
item.description: Islam’s inherent disdain for non-Muslims must not intrude on the pieties of interfaith harmony, according to the USCCB.

item.title: 5 States Handed Out $1.4B In Federal Medicaid Funding To Illegals
item.description: Five states and Washington, D.C., funneled more than $1.35 billion in federal taxpayer Medicaid funding to illegals, according to a preliminary audit ...

item.title: Charlie Puth Tacitly Disavows Abortion Advocacy With Musical Musings On His Unborn Child
item.description: Regardless of whether he would affirm it outright, Charlie Puth's musical reflections shine on the dignity of human life at all its stages.
